TopicTitle: Spacecraft parts are all weird after spinning it at insane speeds and stopping it suddendly with time warp

Articles.Content:
Hello,

 

I am not sure if this is a bug, but I spun my spacecraft with SAS as fast as I could (it was really fast) and after I enabled time warp to stop the rotation my crafts geometry got all weird

This should be all 1 spacecraft

Not sure if this is an actual bug or just how the game engine works. In case it is, I am just posting this here.

just leaving this one here
